strings.SS2_NEMESIS_MERCENARY_PRIMARY_SHOTGUN_DE: <style=cIsUtility>Agile</style>. Fire a shotgun blast for <style=cIsDamage>6x80% damage</style>, and again when released. Can hold up to 2 shells.
strings.SS2_NEMESIS_MERCENARY_SECONDARY_SLASH_DE: Lunge and slash for <style=cIsDamage>2x300% damage</style>.  <style=cIsUtility>Can be used while dashing</style>.
strings.SS2_NEMESIS_MERCENARY_SECONDARY_KNIFE_DE: Throw your knife for <style=cIsDamage>200% damage</style>. Rip it out to deal <style=cIsDamage>500% damage</style>.
strings.SS2_NEMESIS_MERCENARY_UTILITY_SLIDE_DESC: <style=cIsUtility>Slide</style> while preparing a targeted dash that deals <style=cIsDamage>300% damage</style>.
strings.SS2_NEMESIS_MERCENARY_SPECIAL_SCAN_DESCR: Reveal <style=cIsUtility>attack vectors</style> around up to <style=cIsDamage>4</style> nearby enemies. <style=cIsUtility>Move into position</style> to dash forward, dealing <style=cIsDamage>1500% damage</style>.
strings.SS2_NEMESIS_MERCENARY_SPECIAL_CLONE_DESC: Summon a <style=cIsUtility>clone</style> that <style=cIsDamage>copies your abilities</style>. Recast to dash to it, dealing <style=cIsDamage>800% damage</style>.
strings.SS2_NEMESIS_MERCENARY_SPECIAL_CLONE_DASH: Dash to your clone, dealing <style=cIsDamage>800% damage</style>.
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_NEMESIS_MERCENARY_MASTER: As Nemesis Mercenary, beat the game or obliterate on Monsoon or harder.
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_NEMESIS_MERCENARY_GRANDM: As Nemesis Mercenary, beat the game or obliterate on Typhoon.
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_NEMESIS_MERCENARY_NEMESI: As Nemesis Mercenary, defeat Mercenary's vestige.
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_NEMESIS_MERCENARY_BOSSAT: As Nemesis Mercenary, apply 8 or more stacks of Gouge to a single target at once.
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_NEMESIS_MERCENARY_GRENAD: As Nemesis Mercenary, carry at least 20 Lunar items on Stage 8.
strings.SS2_ACHIEVEMENT_NEMESIS_MERCENARY_SWORDB: As Nemesis Mercenary, reach 100% bleed chance.
